ygData.subject: Dumb Newbie Question of the DAY!
ygData.msgSnippet: I playede EQ a lil bit awhile back, and I m just trying to get back into it. I m having a prolem talking with the NPC s...I know, laugh all ya want...but it s
ygData.messageBody:
I playede EQ a lil bit awhile back, and I'm just trying to get back into it. I'm having a prolem talking with the NPC's...I know, laugh all ya want...but it's frustrating since i don't remember exactly how to talk to one, the manual is as useless, since it just says to questio them...no formaats or anything...and when I'm talking to someone like Gunlok Jore, the paladin...I can hail him, he gives me the spiel...Now HOW DO I BLOODY ASKM HIM ABOUT THE UNDEAD? I've tried "What about undead?" and so many variations...Please give me  hand...I know it's a newbie thing, but it's just annoying as hell...
 
John
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------
A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion,
butcher a hog, design a building, con a ship, write a sonnet, balance
accounts, build a wall, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders,
cooperate, act alone, solve an equation, analyze a new problem, pitch
manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die
gallantly.
 
 Specialization is for insects.
 
Robert A. Heinlein
